'''The Heir of Númenor''' is the seventeenth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was not featured in the theatrical release of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''.

[[Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers scenes|17]]
